"Recover the Rare Minerals": "Recover the rare minerals!"
"Recover the rare minerals scattered around!"
"Picked up $(1) #$(0)."
"$(0)s recovered: $(1)."
"$(0)s recovered: $(1).  Earned $(2) EXP and $(3) meseta."
"稀少鉱物を回収せよ！"
"稀少鉱物を回収せよ！"
"点在する稀少鉱物を回収せよ！"
"$(0)個目の$(1)を拾いました。"
"$(0)が$(1)個回収しました。"
"$(0)が$(1)個回収しました。$(2)EXP $(3)メセタ獲得"

"Listen up. Rare minerals have been detected
nearby. ARKS operatives in the area have been
reassigned to recover them."

"Listen up, this is urgent. We've detected strong readings
for rare minerals, but we have limited time to collect them.
ARKS ops are to recover them before the time limit runs out."

"All right, target items recovered.
You've done well."

"We couldn't recover enough.
Oh well, back to your regular assignment, then."

"Rare minerals detected
at $(0)."

"New target items have appeared!
Do your best to recover them."

"First, recover the rare minerals.
Then bring them to the pod."

"Okay, the rare minerals have been recovered.
Keep it up."

"Looking good. That's about half of the amount
we need. Continue with the rest of the task."

"Rare minerals recovered.
Now you're almost there. Just a bit more."

"That's right, those are the rare minerals.
Their scarcity makes them extremely valuable, so
we need to collect them whenever we can."

"All right, that looks like about half.
Don't forget to bring them to the pod."

"You have enough of the minerals now.
Get them back to the pod as soon as you can."

"You're running out of time.
Get the minerals back to the pod quickly."
"Time is almost up. Get moving!"

"通達だ。その近辺で稀少鉱物の反応が
確認された。アークス各員は
回収任務へと移行せよ。"

"緊急通達。稀少鉱物の反応が顕著だ。
作戦許諾時間は限られている。
各員、急ぎ回収任務を遂行しろ。"

"よし、対象物の回収を確認。
よくやったな。"

"ち、必要十分な数は集まらなかったか。
仕方がない。通常任務へと戻れ。"

"稀少鉱物の反応は
$(0)からだ。"

"新しい回収対象物が確認された。
各員回収を進めてくれ。"

"まずは稀少鉱物を回収しろ。
ポッドを使うのはその後だ。"

"よし、稀少鉱物の運搬を確認。
引き続き回収を進めろ。"

"いいぞ、半数程度は回収できた。
引き続き任務を遂行しろ。"

"稀少鉱物の回収確認。
残数もあとわずかだ。いいぞ。"

"そうだ、それが稀少鉱物だ。
発見しにくい分、稀少なわけだな。"

"よし、そいつで大体半数だ。
運搬も忘れるなよ。"

"今の回収で、必要十分数は満たした。
早急にポッドへと運搬しろ。"

"作戦許諾時間が少なくなってきた。
回収と運搬を急げ。"

"残り時間はあとわずかだ。
各員、回収を急げ。"
